Blog.post: This is just a test.

I sent out my final batch of e-mails for the main page admins. I know... you LS members want to praticipate too ^_^ but I haven't got the messageboard up yet. I'm working on that. Since this is low cost operation, I'm going to look for a free message board.
testing this out. still having that sound prob. ><

I managed to make 65k in profits on harvesting! It would have been around 100k+, but I decided to get harvesting gear, which honestly... isnt' really as good as expected, I just harvest less urlLink Marjoram . I haven't been pulling as much mugwart, but honestly I'm not harvesting as much as I was on Saturday and Sunday.
Just checking out the new site, and curious to see how many LS members will use it. Thanks To yoki for setting this up!
Check out the POL site for more information! urlLink http://www.playonline.com/ff11us/polnews/news2289.shtml

Now that I have Dark to 30 I have decided to Level theif to use it as a subjob for Ranger and Dark, however I fiture its in my best intrest to develop my Theif past 30 and into Level 45 to get Treasure Finder II. So it looks like I might be in THF for the long haul ^_^
Need to get rank up? Hopefully we can get some help for it, but so far: Nite, Ichi, Yoki, and me (Endless) are going to try to get it done.

Yes, we finished Rank 5 tonight! We all made it through in one piece... except for Endless(dori)... she died... again. But we all have are airship passes, and are 10k richer! oh wait... I owe ping 5k... endless 6k... and beepo 500... oh mugger bugger :\

Endless(doridorimonkey), Beepo, and I managed to finish up our Rank 4 missions. It was pretty hard, and both Endless, and Beepo died once :( But luckly with Pinglou, Gandorf, and two other tag-alongs help, we finished the missions sucessfuly! we are working on rank 5 right now. Wish us luck!
urlLink http://home.comcast.net/~earendil1/TaruD.jpg Saw this in ffxionline.com forum.... LOL XD
This is a nice all in one info site on FFXI. urlLink http://somepage.com/ffxi/ Good Huntin'
Hmmm, rank 5 done. We still have 3 members that need ranks 4 and 5. Lets try and get them ranked up next weekend.

I really would like to see this LS grow. If you have friends, or just see good people with potential (friendly, likes to level together, do quest, etc.) let the sac holders know. =) As long as they aren't a pain and only come on to ask for things. ------------------------------------------------------ Rank 4 and 5: For those who were not able to do it last weekend. This is your chance! ^^ Just have Rank 3 done, and we can give you directions from there. This does take a lot of time, so if just want to tag along for 4 that is fine also.

Tyriel and Pinglou both helped me obtain my Ninja Job Flag today!! It wasn't that hard... but I guess there isn't alot thats hard when your level 50+. Thanks alot you two, I'm glad to be in the same LS with you two!

Ok here is the current information all over FFXI forums: ----------------------------------------------------------------------- 1 turn in gets you the normal Yukata. 4 more turn ins gets you the Lord/Lady's Yukata (HQ) For every turn in after that (you can only turn in 1) you get normal items like Summer Fans (a firework( and Chocobo Tickets. After turning in the items for the two Yukatas I had 3 left. (I tried turning in 8, and then 7, it would only take 1 at a time). 1st Item got Onoko Yukata 2nd - 5th got Lord's Yukata 6th got 15 Summer Fans 7th got 16 Summer Fans 8th got 4 Chocobo Tickets 9th got 3 Chocobo Tickets ----------------------------------------------------------------------- So enjoy the event! ^^v /tell me if you want to team up with a ( Hume F) or a (Tarutaru M) I got my Onoko Yukata so far, when I get home I plan to get the Lady Yukata =)

Ping suggested that we start doing some more LS events such as NM hunting. This could be a good time for 3 things: -Getting the LS together -Making a small profit (depending on how many show up) -piss off the other NM hunters ^^; If anyone has any other ideas, please let us all know in the LS. I know rank is one, but doing that every weekend will get VERY tiring... @.@ Enjoy the summer fest while it is here! (^_^)d I am pretty sure there will be more to the fest in a few days.

We have merged with the Lost Wanderers linkshell. Members that will be moved to the new LS will be issued new Link Pearls. If you did not recive a new pearl contact either Pinglou or Doridorimonkey. Please do not agrovate LS members if you where not invited. I would also like to thank Halanek for allowing us into the linkshell ^_^
I purchased the domain lostwanderers.net which will redirect you to the site :)
Finished the last touches, our board is online! As people register I'll start adding peoples admin rights, and member titles to the board :)
We now have a mini-board, and forums for the LS! The mini-board works right now, but the forums are still under maintance. enjoy!

Getting really bored in my GE class, so I figured I would make a quick post. Thanks Yoki for setting up the domain! I had no problem with the url before, but this is nice. ^^; I was trying to get the LS ( EssenseOfDarkness) to combine a month ago, but that didn't work out too well. We finally made the big move and it seems to be working out well. Though I think some of the LW members are wondering where this chunk of members came from. @.@ If Yoki does not have enough bandwith to support images being posted, I can check out a small plan so everyone can post their images from FFXI. Well, I need find something else to kill time now. see everyone on the game. -Endless

As the title says, stopping in to introduce myself. I've talked to most of you at one time or another. If you have any questions or anything let me know. Yoki, I also was curious about a message board and possibly a place for LS members to post screenshots if they so desire. Hopefully this will be a good place for people to stop in when they're at work, school or otherwise detained from FFXI! AHh, need our fix. ^^ There I go running on again. Also wanted to say welcome aboard, I've known Endless and Ping too kinda sorta about two monthes now and they're nice people, so I think I can say I trust their judgement and everyone will fit in smoothly! Usually transitions such as this can cause some difficulty, but I believe it will be for the better for us all. That is all I have for now, if you have any questions for me just shoot me a line in game, or even here. I'll probably check in all the time during the week, but weekends are my time so I usually am on game or with family. :D Hal

I was browsing the web at work... yeah, like I do any real work. (oh god please don't fire me, I need the money so bad) And I found this japanse store that sold all kinds of FFXI stuff!! I mean look at this! urlLink Goblin Plush Doll : what can't you do with this!! I would love to have one of these guys on my desk to beat on when a random mugger buggers me in the middle of the dunes while leveling my crappy Ninja. urlLink : Vana' diel Clock Screw you world and your fancy 24hrs, I'm on Vana' diel time!! For those times you HAVE to know if its time to add another cystal to your plant on iceday! urlLink Plush Mandy : Well kiss your insomnia goodbye with your very own mandy doll! urlLink Bald Galka Handbag : No, I'm not kidding, it really says "BALD GALKA" on the bag. I guess hot mithras dig bald galka... or something... err... next. urlLink Caution : Explosives, Goblin Ashtray : To remind the smokers in your party, while they are sucking ash.. their PT is get'n nuked by a Goblin Ambusher. urlLink BCNM Ashtray : Kinna gives a new meaning to burrning circle, don't it? urlLink TP 100% WS OK : So now anywhere you can inform the masses, you are ready for an SC! urlLink Beast Men Rule : Now everyone knows secretly, you where work'n for the other side! urlLink Level Down : Because someone has to pull the hate. urlLink Yugado Drink, Mug : because you really need the mana perk-me-up in the morning! urlLink Link! : And your party hates you for it too... urlLink Genkai 5, Maat : How are you gonna explain to your friends that your level 70 ass just got wup'ed by an old man?

Frontmission will be comming to Playonline pertty soon now. They are already seeking PS2 Boradband owners in Japan to praticipate in the beta. *sigh* I don't know if I can afford IDs for both Final Fantasy, and Frontmission!! DAMN you Square! For those who have never played, the frontmission series are a set of Mecha based turn based stragegy games developed by squaresoft durring the mid 90s. The most recent incarnation is Frontmission 4 for the PS2, which is out now. The games mix political intrigue with highly customizable mecha. Screenshots of the new Frontmission online can be found here : urlLink https://secure.playonline.com/fmo/guide/screenshot/index.html

I like being able to do events with people/LS so if you ever want to farm,mine, NM hunt, etc. Let me know! I use to farm a lot with Ping which was so much more fun. I plan to try it out again with Magicite and Pinglou this weekend. Blm, Sum/Thf, and Brd/Rng = zero down time farming XD Also, if anyone is up for log/mine feel free to just tell me when. Having a partner for this sort of thing makes it go faster. So if your up for money making + group fun then /tell. \(^-^)/ -Endless
